description: The Setos' ancestral home straddles Estonia's border with Russia and has become difficult to cross.
title: Setomaa: The Estonia-Russia border tearing apart an ancient people
title_page: Setomaa: The Estonia-Russia border tearing apart an ancient people - BBC News
maintext: Even though for the moment much of the Setos' ancestral territory is out of reach, interest in Setomaa is seeing something of a resurgence. Tourism is on the rise and some of the Setos who live outside the region are buying holiday homes to reconnect with their roots.
